pendingLines.line: Stage 0 Removing-Accessory:
Prancing Boots... I still remember wearing those in SAO...
She really is like I was back then, right down to her equipment...
Well, so far so good... I guess.
Stage 1 Removing-Accessory:
Those stockings... I remember wearing those too. I still think back to when I wore them again, during the Augma incident.
(This is still so strange. Seriously.)
Another part of my whole skill setup back then...
Stage 2 Removing-Accessory:
Well, it would be the obvious choice for me too, in that situation.
I guess we do have the same overall mindset. But she still feels off to me... and not just for the obvious reasons.
And to think, even after SAO, I'd only have this confidence in virtual games. It wouldn't translate so easily to reality... like when I needed to confront mom.
Stage 1 Removed-Accessory:
Even the quest name is the exact same. And even now, this is so strange...
The Laketop Fortress quest... there were other rewards for it, but that was the one I chose.
They provided a small boost to my jumps, and softened the sounds of my footsteps; real handy for movement and hunting purposes.
Stage 2 Removed-Accessory:
...It's 'Knights of Blood Oath', actually. But I always remembered how the others got me to wear that uniform.
The others kinda guilt-tripped me into wearing it in SAO, because it was so expensive...
I remember how happy I was to wear that uniform again, even briefly, when facing An Incarnation Of The Radius during the Augma incident... SAO's true Floor 100 boss.
Stage 3 Removed-Accessory:
I remember that too. Every little bonus made a difference between life and death, as much as skill did...
The other me thinks this is a safe zone... as if she's still inside SAO, somehow; she's not even aware of me.
(This version of me almost sounds like Kirito is... is still just a crush? So before the last weeks before the game was cleared, before we got really close.)
